com.zhonghu.sip.api

类 SipCallSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zhonghu.sip.api.SipCallSession
  • 直接已知子类:
    SipCallSessionImpl

    public class SipCallSession
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents state of a call session
    This class helps to serialize/deserialize the state of the media layer
    Changing these fields has no effect on the sip call session : it's only a structured holder for datas

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  SipCallSession.InvState
      Describe the control state of a call
      Pjsip documentation
      static class  SipCallSession.MediaState
      Describe the media state of the call
      Pjsip documentation
      static class  SipCallSession.StatusCode
      Status code of the sip call dialog Actually just shortcuts to SIP codes
      Pjsip documentation

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static <any> CREATOR
      Parcelable creator.
      static int INVALID_CALL_ID
      Id of an invalid or not existant call
      static java.lang.String OPT_CALL_EXTRA_HEADERS
      Option key to add custom headers (with X- prefix).
      static java.lang.String OPT_CALL_VIDEO
      Option key to flag video use for the call.
      int primaryKey
      Primary key for the parcelable object
      static int TRANSPORT_SECURE_FULL
      The call signaling is supposed to be secured end to end.
      static int TRANSPORT_SECURE_NONE
      The call signaling is not secure
      static int TRANSPORT_SECURE_TO_SERVER
      The call signaling is secure until it arrives on server.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      SipCallSession()
      Constructor for a sip call session state object
      It will contains default values for all flags This class as no setter/getter for members flags
      It's aim is to allow to serialize/deserialize easily the state of a sip call, not to modify it

    • 字段详细资料

      • OPT_CALL_VIDEO

        public static final java.lang.String OPT_CALL_VIDEO
        Option key to flag video use for the call.
        The value must be a boolean.
        另请参阅:
        Boolean, 常量字段值

      • OPT_CALL_EXTRA_HEADERS

        public static final java.lang.String OPT_CALL_EXTRA_HEADERS
        Option key to add custom headers (with X- prefix).
        The value must be a bundle with key representing header name, and value representing header value.
        另请参阅:
        Bundle, 常量字段值

      • TRANSPORT_SECURE_NONE

        public static int TRANSPORT_SECURE_NONE
        The call signaling is not secure

      • TRANSPORT_SECURE_TO_SERVER

        public static int TRANSPORT_SECURE_TO_SERVER
        The call signaling is secure until it arrives on server. After, nothing ensures how it goes.

      • TRANSPORT_SECURE_FULL

        public static int TRANSPORT_SECURE_FULL
        The call signaling is supposed to be secured end to end.

      • INVALID_CALL_ID

        public static final int INVALID_CALL_ID
        Id of an invalid or not existant call
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • primaryKey

        public int primaryKey
        Primary key for the parcelable object

      • CREATOR

        public static final <any> CREATOR
        Parcelable creator. So that it can be passed as an argument of the aidl interface

      • SipCallSession

        public SipCallSession()
        Constructor for a sip call session state object
        It will contains default values for all flags This class as no setter/getter for members flags
        It's aim is to allow to serialize/deserialize easily the state of a sip call, not to modify it

        public boolean isIncoming()
        Get the call way
        返回:
        true if the remote party was the caller

      • getConnectStart

        public long getConnectStart()
        Get the start time of the connection of the call
        返回:
        duration in milliseconds
        另请参阅:
        SystemClock#elapsedRealtime()

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        Check if the call state indicates that it is an active call in progress. This is equivalent to state incoming or early or calling or confirmed or connecting
        返回:
        true if the call can be considered as in progress/active

      • isOngoing

        public boolean isOngoing()
        Chef if the call state indicates that it's an ongoing call. This is equivalent to state confirmed.
        返回:
        true if the call can be considered as ongoing.

      • getConfPort

        public int getConfPort()
        Get the sounds conference board port
        Pjsip documentation
        返回:
        the conf port of the audio media of this call

      • getAccId

        public long getAccId()
        Get the identifier of the account corresponding to this call
        This identifier is the one you have in SipProfile.id
        It may return SipProfile.INVALID_ID if no account detected for this call. Example, case of peer to peer call
        返回:
        The SipProfile.id of the account use for this call

      • getTransportSecureLevel

        public int getTransportSecureLevel()
        Get the secure level of the signaling of the call.
        返回:
        one of TRANSPORT_SECURE_NONE, TRANSPORT_SECURE_TO_SERVER, TRANSPORT_SECURE_FULL

      • isMediaSecure

        public boolean isMediaSecure()
        Get the secure level of the media of the call
        返回:
        true if the call has a media encrypted

      • getMediaSecureInfo

        public java.lang.String getMediaSecureInfo()
        Get the information about the media security of this call
        返回:
        the information about the media security

      • isLocalHeld

        public boolean isLocalHeld()
        Get the information about local held state of this call
        返回:
        the information about local held state of media

      • isRemoteHeld

        public boolean isRemoteHeld()
        Get the information about remote held state of this call
        返回:
        the information about remote held state of media

      • isBeforeConfirmed

        public boolean isBeforeConfirmed()
        Check if the specific call info indicates that it is a call that has not yet been confirmed by both ends.
        In other worlds if the call is in state, calling, incoming early or connecting.
        返回:
        true if the call can be considered not yet been confirmed

      • isAfterEnded

        public boolean isAfterEnded()
        Check if the specific call info indicates that it is a call that has been ended
        In other worlds if the call is in state, disconnected, invalid or null
        返回:
        true if the call can be considered as already ended

      • getLastStatusCode

        public int getLastStatusCode()
        Get the latest status code of the sip dialog corresponding to this call call
        返回:
        the status code
        另请参阅:
        SipCallSession.StatusCode

      • getLastStatusComment

        public java.lang.String getLastStatusComment()
        Get the last status comment of the sip dialog corresponding to this call
        返回:
        the last status comment string from server

      • getLastReasonCode

        public int getLastReasonCode()
        Get the latest SIP reason code if any. For now only supports 200 (if SIP reason is set to 200) or 0 in other cases (no SIP reason / sip reason set to something different).
        返回:
        the status code

      • mediaHasVideo

        public boolean mediaHasVideo()
        Get whether the call has a video media stream connected
        返回:
        true if the call has a video media stream

      • isRecording

        public boolean isRecording()
        Get the current call recording status for this call.
        返回:
        true if we are currently recording this call to a file

      • canRecord

        public boolean canRecord()
        Get the capability to record the call to a file.
        返回:
        true if it should be possible to record the call to a file

      • isZrtpSASVerified

        public boolean isZrtpSASVerified()
        返回:
        the zrtpSASVerified

      • getHasZrtp

        public boolean getHasZrtp()
        返回:
        whether call has Zrtp encryption active

      • getCallStart

        public long getCallStart()
        Get the start time of the call.
        返回:
        the callStart start time of the call.
